thread.title: Janet Jackson Pretends to Be a Statue to Surprise Her Fans
thread.title_full: Janet Jackson Pretends to Be a Statue to Surprise Her Fans

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Janet Jackson Pretends to Be a Statue to Surprise Her Fans
text:
Comments The 'Unbreakable' singer closed her eyes and stood still next to a mannequin donning a black concert costume at Janet's My Music VIP museum and fans were surprised as she moved. 
Janet Jackson recently gave her fans surprise at Janet's My Music VIP museum. In a video obtained by Entertainment Tonight , the 49-year-old singer pretended to be a statue at the museum and surprised her fans as she moved. In the said video, the "BURNITUP!" singer closed her eyes and stood still next to a mannequin donning a black concert costume. Janet looked chic in a black outfit. Her fans who thought they would only see Janet's collections at the museum went into hysterics after they noticed that the statue moved and it was their idol. The singer then took time to shake hands and take pictures with her fans. One her fans even got a chance to kiss her cheeks. In the video, a fan could be heard saying, "Janet, we love you." Another fan explained the sweet surprise Janet gave, "I saw her and I said, 'Oh my God! That's her!' " They were clearly excited meeting the singer directly. Another part of the video showed Janet talking to a fan about her new album " Unbreakable ". The singer said, "This is my favorite album, the cover, the title..." Her fan responded, "Oh my God, it's a beautiful picture." Janet was then escorted by some bodyguards as she left the room. Janet's new album, "Unbreakable", marked her seventh No. 1 on the Billboard 200 chart. Concertgoers who buy the album will get early entry into the concert in addition to access to Janet's My Music VIP website and the Janet Museum.
